280564.「はっ……はい！\n 王子どの ご所望の品……\n 風の結晶を お持ちしたであり:
Y...yes! I have brought the item you have
requested, your Highness! One Wind Crystal!

280567.「じつは ヴェリナード王国では かねてから\n どんな悪天候でも 進めるような\:
The truth is that Verinard has been long
working on a magical ship that can sail in
any weather, no matter how bad it is.

280568.「その船の動力として必要なのが 風の結晶でね。\n 世界中から探し求め たった今:
And the ship needs a Wind Crystal to power it.
I've searched all over for one, and now I
finally have it! Now we can search the seas!

280569.「魔法船は すでに\n ジュレットの町へ 運ばせてある。\n さっそく 向かうと:
The magical ship is already waiting in Julet.
Let's head over there!

280571.「お前は 次代の王となる者。\n さらに こたびの異変調査の 責任者のはず。:
You are next to inherit the throne.
Furthermore, you should be the one leading the
investigation of this recent anomaly.

280572.「そのような立場にあるにも かかわらず\n お前みずから 大荒れの海へ調査に向か:
In spite of such a role, it seems quite rash
for you to go out sailing into the stormy seas
in order to conduct a search.

280573.「しっ しかし……\n このような危機にこそ 責任ある立場の者が\n 先頭に立つ:
B...but...is it not the responsibility of such
roles to take the lead in precisely these
kinds of dire situations?

280574.「それで お前に万一のことがあれば どうする。\n 異変の調査は……王を失った\:
And what if something were to happen to you?
As for this investigation...what will the
people of Verinard do if their king is lost?

280575.「何度言えば わかるのだ。\n お前は 自分の命の重さを 自覚せよ！:
How many times do I have to tell you?!
You must realize the importance of your life!

280577.「まっ……まあまあ！\n 少し 落ち着こうじゃないか。\n ディオーレも オーデ:
W...well, anyways! Why don't we all just take
a deep breath, huh? Diore? Odis? Well?

280578.「……オーディス王子の おっしゃることは\n 王の心得として 決して 間違ってい:
You are not wrong in what you are saying,
certainly as a king, Odis... But...

280579.「……いいんだ セーリア。\n たしかに 母上のほうが正しい。\n 僕は 同行す:
It's okay, Celia. My mother is right.
I shouldn't go with them...

280580.「心配ありません オーディス王子。\n 私たちに お任せください！:
You have no need to worry, Prince Odis.
We'll take care of everything!

280581.「王子もご存じのとおり ここにいるのは\n 暴君バサグランデをはじめ 数々の脅威:
As you already know, there's a great champion
here who's defeated the Tyrant Bogan, as well
as countless other threats.

280582.「必ずや 謎の歌が聞こえるという\n 海域の調査を成しとげ\n 今回の異変も 解:
I'm certain they'll be able to investigate the
place with the mysterious melody and solve
this strange oddity.

280583.「……あっ 申しおくれました。\n 私は <pc>に お仕えしている\n ユーラ:
Ah, my apologies. My name is Yuliza, and I
work together with <pc>.

280584.「そうか……ありがとう ユーライザ君。\n <pc>君 すまないが\n また 君:
I see...thank you, Yuliza. I'm sorry,
<pc>, but I'm going to need your
help once again.

280585.「これを 君に託そう。: I'll leave this in your care.

280587.「ジュレットの町の 桟橋に\n デーラという名の男が いるはずだ。\n 彼に そ:
There should be a man named Della at the pier
in Julet. Please give that to him.

280588.「デーラは 魔法船の船長だ。\n 風の結晶さえあれば 大嵐の中も進めるだろう。\:
Della is the captain of the magical ship. As
long as he has that crystal, he'll be able to
sail through the storm. Best of luck to you!

280590.「これは 英雄リナーシェの魂！\n ですが……輝きが弱い。どうやら これは\n:
This is Linashe's soul! But...it has a weak
luster. It seems this is just a piece of her
soul...a fragment, if you will.

280592.「あ…あなたは 盟友さま……それに天使さまも。\n わたくしは 何を……ここは:
Y...you are the Ally... and an angel, too...
What am... I doing here...?

280593.「やはり リナーシェなのですね。\n 神化の儀が失敗し あなたは悪神となった。\:
So it is Linashe. The deification ritual
failed, and you became a fiend. Do you
remember anything after that?

280596.「そう……あれは まぼろし。\n わたくしが生きた時代の 記憶……。:
Yes...that is just an illusion. A memory from
the time when I was still alive...

280597.「６００年前のウェナ諸島は\n コルレーン王国と ジュレド王国という\n ふたつ:
Six hundred years ago, the Wena Islands were
divided between two kingdoms: the Kingdom of
Colrane and the Kingdom of Juled.

280598.「わたくしは コルレーン王国の女王でしたが\n この日は ジュレド王国を\n 訪:
I was Colrane's queen. However, on this
particular day, I was visiting Juled...

280599.「お願いします リナーシェ殿。: Lady Linashe, if you would be so kind.

280601.<center>……水に生まれ 水と生きる。\nそれが我ら ウェディの民。:
Born in the water, in the water we thrive...
We are Weddie, one with the tide...

280602.<center>母なる水に祈りを捧げ\n我らは求める 神の慈愛を。\n水が育む:
To the mother water do our prayers ascend, Seeking divine grace, to us kindly extend, Abundant blessings that water do bestow,
Its nurturing grace does flourish and grow.

280603.<center>大いなる水の神よ。\n我らの思い 我らの願い\nかなえたまえ 守:
O mighty deity of water's embrace,
Grant our desires, our hopes you trace,
Fulfill our wishes and protect with grace.

280604.「おお……畑が……！\n こんなに立派な作物は 見たことがない！\n 奇跡だ！:
Ohh...! The field...! I've never seen such
magnificent crops! It's truly a miracle!

280605.「これで家族を 飢え死にさせずに済む……！\n ありがとうございます！\n あり:
Now our family won't have to starve!
Thank you! Thank you so much...!

280606.「これが 水に 聖なる加護を与えるという\n 育みの歌……。よもや 地中の水脈を:
The Song of Nurture...a song of a sacred blessing of water. Who would have thought it possible to guide water from underground and
bear crops in an otherwise withered field?

280607.「土地のやせた このウェナ諸島において\n これほどの 実りが……なんと\n す:
How wonderful that even here in the Wena
Island's barren lands there could be such
a marvelous harvest! Right, Brother?

280608.「そうだな カルーモ。\n 目の前の光景が まだ信じられないよ。\n リナーシェ:
That's right, Carumo. I still can't fully
believe what I've just seen. Lady Linashe's
singing really is a miracle.

280609.「我が民のため コルレーン王国から はるばる\n おいでいただき このヴィゴレー:
As Juled's king, I, Vigoray, am eternally
grateful for you coming all the way from
Colrane to help my people.

280610.「いいえ ヴィゴレーさま。\n 我が夫となる あなたさまのためでしたら\n わた:
Pay it no mind, Mr. Vigoray. For you, the one
to become my husband...I would go anywhere. <heart>

280611.「それに あなたの民は\n わたくしの民でも ありますもの。: And besides...your people are also my people.

280612.「あなたのジュレド王国と\n わたくしのコルレーン王国を 統合して\n 誕生する:
The new kingdom that will be born from the
two of our own kingdoms joining together...

280613.「その王妃となる わたくしが\n 王のため 民のために 尽くすのは\n 当然のこ:
As their queen, it's only natural that I
should devote myself to serving the king
and his people.

280614.「貴女のような方を 王妃に戴けるなんて\n 民は 幸せですね。\n ほかの誰より:
My people are so lucky to have a queen such
as you. Me, more than anyone else...

280615.「新しい城が完成した あかつきには\n 建国と 私たちの結婚を祝う 盛大な式典を:
When the new castle is built, we shall hold a grand ceremony to celebrate the founding of our new country and our marriage. I very much
look forward to that day...

280616.「兄上とリナーシェ様の 結婚式……。\n おふたりの姿を 想像しただけで\n 僕:
Just the thought of you and Linashe's
wedding fills my heart with immense
happiness...

280617.「おっと カルーモ。お前が見たいのは\n 花嫁姿のリナーシェ殿だけだろう？:
Hey, Carumo...all you care about seeing is
Lady Linashe in her wedding dress, right?

280618.「なっ 何をおっしゃるのですか 兄上！\n そんなことは……！: W-what are you talking about?! That's not...

280619.「まあ ヴィゴレーさま。あまり からかっては\n 弟君が かわいそうですわ。: Come now, Vigoray. Don't tease him too much.

280620.「カルーモさまも あなたさまの治世を\n より良きものにしたいと願う わたくしの:
As my comrade, Carumo here also wishes to
contribute to improving your rule. Please
be kind to him, okay? <heart>

280621.「ははっ それは頼もしいことだ！\n ……カルーモよ。お前も リナーシェ殿と共に:
Haha! I know I can count on that. I hope
that you and Linashe will both continue to
stand by my side and support me.

280622.「兄上……！\n はい！ よろこんで！: Yes...! Of course! It's my pleasure!

280623.「……すべては まぼろし。\n 二度とは戻らぬ 過去の記憶……。:
Everything is an illusion...memories of the
past that will never return...

280625.「魂の破片でしか ないせいか……\n もう これ以上は\n 何も語ってくれないよ:
I think that's all she's going to tell us...
perhaps it's because this is only a fragment
of her soul.

280626.「原因は わかりませんが リナーシェの魂は\n バラバラに 分散してしまったよう:
I'm not sure how, but it seems Linashe's soul
has split into fragments...I'll take care of
them.

280627.「悪神化の呪いは 過去の記憶や 心の傷に干渉し\n 怒りや憎悪を あおるもの。…:
The fiends' curse is something that interferes with past memories and emotional scars, which in turn manifests anger and hatred. Perhaps
that memory is related somehow.

280628.「ほかの 魂の破片も集めれば\n 呪いを解く方法が わかるかもしれません。\n:
If we can find the other soul fragments, we
may be able to figure out how to break the
curse. Let's keep on the lookout for more.

280629.「ここは わたくしの私室です。\n わたくしが 部屋に戻ると\n いつも あの子:
This is my own private room. Whenever I
returned here, she always came to see
me...

280631.「ただいま アリア。\n わたくしが留守の間 いい子にしていましたか？:
Yes, I'm back, Aria. Have you been a good girl
while I've been away?

280632.「うんっ。ちゃんと お姉ちゃんの代理で\n 町の人の訴えを 聞いたりしてたよ！:
Yeah! I was carefully listening to the
townspeople's complaints in your place while
you were gone!

280633.「……裸足で そこらへん歩いて\n お行儀が悪い！ って\n じいやに怒られたり:
"It's bad manners to walk around barefoot!"
they'd say. I did get scolded a few times.

280634.「ふふっ。女王代行 おつかれさまでした。\n みな 変わりなかったようで 何より:
Hehe, I appreciate your hard work, Ms.
Substitute Queen. It makes me happy to hear
that everyone is doing well.

280635.「お姉ちゃんのほうこそ どうだったの？\n 育みの歌は……うまくいった？:
How did things go for you? That song...
did it work?

280636.「ええ。\n ジュレドの方々にも……ヴィゴレーさまにも\n よろこんで いただけ:
It did. The people of Juled and even Vigoray
himself were quite pleased.

280638.「……アリア。\n わたくしと ヴィゴレーさまの婚姻が\n まだ 許せませんか？:
Aria...do you still not approve of my marriage
with him?

280639.「当たり前だよ！ だって コルレーンと\n ジュレドは 何百年も 敵対してて……:
Of course I don't! Colrane and Juled have been
enemies for hundreds of years...and they
killed Father!

280640.「あたしは 小さかったから あんまり\n 覚えてないけど……あいつら\n 休戦の:
I was so small, so I don't remember too much,
but...they broke their truce and attacked us,
didn't they?

280641.「ジュレド軍は なんとか追い返したけど\n 勇敢な戦士だった お父さまは 死んじ:
Juled's army managed to push them back, but
Father was a brave warrior who ended up dying!
I can't approve of marrying that man!

280642.「……そうですね。コルレーン王国と\n ジュレド王国の間には あまりに深い\n:
...yes, you're right. There exists too much
anger and hatred lingering between Juled
and Colrane...

280643.「ですが 殺し合いをしたのは 先代の王たち。\n その子である ヴィゴレーさまと:
But it was the kings of the past who committed such horrible acts. As children of those kings, Vigoray and I have decided to put aside
those grudges and join hands with one another.

280644.「そもそも 二国が争うのは\n 土地のやせた ウェナ諸島の中で\n わずかな実り:
The two countries fight because they compete
for what little they have in the barren lands
of the Wena Islands...

280645.「わたくしが作った 育みの歌のチカラがあれば\n 豊かな実りを もたらすことがで:
With the power of my Song of Nurture, I can
bring forth many abundant harvests. There's
no longer any reason to fight.

280646.「それで 歌を唄ってほしければ\n コルレーンとジュレドを 対等な立場で\n ひ:
So, if they wanted you to sing, you
basically threatened them to unite Colrane
and Juled together?

280647.「交渉……と 言いなさい。\n ふたつの国が ひとつになれば\n もう奪い合うこ:
I'd call it...a negotiation. When our two
countries become one, there will be no more
competition.

280648.「交渉なんかしないで 戦って\n ジュレドをやっつけちゃえば よかったんだよ！\:
You should have fought and beat them instead
of negotiating! War would be a piece of cake
with you around!

280649.「たしかに わたくしの歌のチカラを\n 戦いに用いれば 勝利も たやすいでしょう:
You are correct that if I use my songs during
battle, victory will come easily. However...
with war inevitably comes blood.

280650.「誰かの恋人が 誰かの父親を殺し\n やがて 誰かの夫に 殺される……。:
Someone's lover kills another's father,
then they are killed by someone's husband...

280652.「お姉ちゃんは 誰より立派な 女王さまだね。\n あたしは お姉ちゃんのことを\:
You really are the most admirable queen I've
ever met. I'm so proud of you...

280653.「でも お姉ちゃん自身の 幸せは？\n 好きでもない人と 結婚しなきゃいけないな:
But what about YOUR happiness? Having to
marry someone you don't even love?! That's
just horrible!

280654.「たしかに 完全なる 政略結婚ね。\n けど ヴィゴレーさまは すてきな方よ？\:
That's true, it is purely a political
marriage. But Vigoray is a wonderful man, no?
I'm happy to call myself his wife.

280655.「だけど……\n かわいい妹に お祝いしてもらえないと\n お姉ちゃん とっても:
But...if my cute little sister isn't there to
congratulate me, I'll be very sad...

280656.「その言い方は ズルいよ……。\n わかった。お姉ちゃんを困らせちゃって\n ゴ:
It's not fair to say things like that...
Okay, I'm sorry that I bothered you...

280657.「そぉだっ！ お姉ちゃん 長旅で疲れたでしょ？\n すっごく甘い フルーツが あ:
Oh yeah! You must be exhausted from your
trip, right? I have some really sweet fruit!
Wait here, I'll bring you some!

280658.「あなたは 何も心配しなくていいのよ。\n 私が すべて 上手くやってみせるから:
You needn't worry about a thing.
I'll take care of everything...

280659.「……愛していた。\n 本当に 愛していたのに……。:
I loved her...
I truly loved her...

280662.「これは 本当に 呪いによって呼び起こされた\n リナーシェにとっての いまわし:
I wonder...is this truly a haunting memory
caused by Linashe's curse...?

280663.「私には 美しい思い出にしか 見えませんが……\n とりあえず 先に進んで\n:
To me, it seems like a beautiful memory...
but let's keep moving and follow the rest
of her memories.

280664.「教えてください リナーシェ。\n あなたの記憶の何が あなたの心を\n さいな:
Please tell me, Linashe. What is it about your
memories that is causing your heart to
suffer?

280665.「あなたは ウェナ諸島を救ったのでしょう。\n 輝かしい過去が なにゆえ\n あ:
You saved the Wena Islands. How could such a
glorious past cause you so much pain?

280666.「苦しませる？ わたくしを？\n わたくしの……過去……？: Cause me pain...? Me...? My... past...?

280667.「ああ 嫌……！\n 見たくない。思いだしたくない。\n こんなもの……！:
No, it's horrible...! I don't want to see it!
I don't want to remember! I don't...!

280668.「ご紹介いたします カルーモさま。\n あなたの義妹となる アリアです。:
Mr. Carumo, allow me to introduce to you your
sister-in-law, Aria.

280669.「……お初にお目にかかります カルーモさま。\n アリアと申します。\n どうぞ:
It's a pleasure to meet you, Mr. Carumo...
My name is Aria. I would be pleased to
make your acquaintance...

280670.「初めまして アリア……と呼んでいいかな？\n 僕のこともカルーモと 気安く呼ん:
Nice to meet you, Aria...is just "Aria" okay?
You can just call me "Carumo" too. I would
be delighted to make your acquaintance.

280672.「では お言葉に甘えましょう。\n 迎えにきてくださって ありがとうございます\:
I'll take you up on your offer, then. Thank
you for coming here to pick me up. How are
things at the castle?

280673.「はい！ 完成した 新しい王城は\n まるで 夢のように美しく……\n 早く お:
Of course! The new royal castle is like a
dream with how beautiful it is... I can't
wait to show it to the both of you!

280674.「ふふっ それは楽しみです。……かの地までは\n きびしい旅に なるかもしれませ:
Hehe, I can't wait. It may be a difficult
journey to get there, but I know you'll do
your best to protect us on the way.

280675.「……はい。王たちが 協定に署名したところで\n 民が 恨みや憎しみを 忘れるわ:
Right...even if the kings did sign a treaty, that doesn't mean the people have forgotten their grudges...that goes for both Juled and
Colrane, I suppose.

280676.「ですが リナーシェ様のことは\n 僕の命に代えても 必ず 守りとおします。:
But I will protect you with everything I have,
even if it costs me my own life!

280677.「……ジュレドの方に そこまで\n 言っていただけるとは 思いませんでした。:
I didn't expect someone from Juled to say
something like that...

280678.「リナーシェ様は 育みの歌で 恵みをもたらし\n 戦争ではなく 歌のチカラによっ:
Linashe brought blessings through her Song
of Nurture...uniting the Wena Islands not
through war, but with the power of song.

280679.「まさに 我らウェディの 救世主！\n 僕は リナーシェ様を 本当に……\n 心:
Truly our savior, the savior of all Weddies!
I deeply and genuinely respect you, Lady
Linashe.

280680.「……ほほーう。\n なるほど なるほど……。: Uh huuuuh... I get it, I get it...

280681.「ふっふーん！ なかなか\n 話がわかるようだね カルーモくんは！:
Mmmhmm! You really know your way with words,
Carumo!

280682.「ははは。おほめいただき 光栄だよ。\n アリアも 育みの歌を唄えるのかい？:
Hahaha. I'm honored by your praises. Can you
sing the Song of Nurture too?

280683.「歌自体は 誰にでも唄えるが その効力が\n 発揮されるのは コルレーン王家の血:
The song itself can be sung by anyone, but
I've heard that it is only effective when sung
by a person with Colrane's royal blood.

280684.「そーだね。あたしも 育みの歌を唄って\n 水に 加護を与えることはできるよ。\:
You're right. I can also sing that song and
bless the water. I can also bear fruit from
that blessed water.

280685.「でも お姉ちゃんみたく 作物を いっぺんに\n 実らせるほどの 効果は出ないん:
But it's not as powerful as my sister's, who
can make a bunch of crops spring up at once.
I think her power is something special.

280686.「歌とは 心……。\n 思いと願いが 織りなす調べ。:
A song is a melody woven by the heart, your
thoughts, and your wishes...

280687.「王家の血に宿りし 歌声のチカラを 最大限\n 発揮するための 旋律と言葉の 組:
The melody and words unite to maximize
the power of our royal bloodline's singing...
that's what my songs are all about.

280688.「我らの血を引く者が 育みの歌を唄えば\n 特別に 強いチカラを持たずとも ウェ:
If those in our bloodline sing the Song of Nurture, we will be able to do our part in bringing prosperity to the Wena Islands...
even if we are not particularly strong.

280689.「ウェディたちの 平和で 豊かな暮らしを\n 守りつづけること。それが\n 王家:
To continue to protect the peaceful and
prosperous lives of all Weddies... It is the
duty of the royal family...and my own wish.

280690.「今のが 思いだしたくない過去……ですか？:
This is the past...that you don't want to
remember?

280691.「……ええ。\n わたくしにとっては 苦しく 耐えがたい……\n けれど 乗り越:
